simplified: 疾风知劲草，烈火见真金
traditional: 疾風知勁草，烈火見真金
pinyin: ji2 feng1 zhi1 jin4 cao3 , lie4 huo3 jian4 zhen1 jin1

definitions.ji2 feng1 zhi1 jin4 cao3 , lie4 huo3 jia: the storm put strong grass to the test, fire tests true gold (idiom); fig. troubled times test a faithful minister; to show one's true colors after a stern test;
